DataElement.preferredName: MD Anderson Symptom Inventory - Core 1 Last 24 Hours Severity Pain at its Worst Score 11 Point Likert Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the severity of pain at the worst in the last 24 hours, using an eleven-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MD Anderson Symptom Inventory - Core Past 24 Hour Severity Pain at its Worst Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather._A question about an individual's pain at its worst._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms.

Property.preferredName: Past Integer::24 Hour Severity Pain at its Worst Score
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.:A question about an individual's pain at its worst.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
A question about an individual's pain at its worst.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: MDASI Severity of Symptom Score 11 Point Likert Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard for the subjective scoring of symptoms that ranges from 0: Not Present to 10: As Bad as You Can Imagine.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 10 on a scale that ranges from 0: Not Present to 10: As Bad as You Can Imagine.

Concepts.definition: A subjective score of 10 on a scale that ranges from 0: Not Present to 10: As Bad as You Can Imagine.
